item.title: Bangalore to Chitradurga Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Chitradurga can be a rewarding experience, with Chitradurga being known for its historical fort and scenic landscapes. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Bangalore to Chitradurga Start your journey early in the morning to make the most of your day. The distance between Bangalore and Chitradurga is approximately 200 kilometers, and it takes around 4
